takeoff_duration.description: The duration of the take off.

boosted_takeoff_duration.description: The duration of the take off.

takeoff_forward_frac.description: The amount of the takeoff force, in pecentage, that is applied in the forward vector, remainder is applied to up vector.

landing_thrust_force.description: The thrust force applied to stop the landing.

landing_thrust_duration.description: The thruster duration of the landing.

landing_thrust_backward_frac.description: The amount of the landing thrust force, in pecentage, that is applied in the backward vector, remainder is applied to up vector.

landing_trigger_delay_time.description: The duration to wait before landing can be triggered.

landing_trigger_velocity.description: The minimum needed velocity before landing can be triggered.

landing_stop_velocity.description: The velocity at which the landing thrusters will stop.

mid_air_adjustment_speed.description: The speed at which you can do adjustment of your overall velocity while falling with the jumppack.

fall_damage_thrusters.description: [bool]Should the jumppack save us from fall damage if it can with a free thrust?

ground_smoke_effect.description: Surface effect type to play on the ground where the exhaust of the jetpack hits activating it.

ability_thrusters_recharge_start.description: The ability to play when we are done charging

ability_thrusters_recharge_done.description: The ability to play when we are done charging

ability_thrusters_activate_jump_fail.description: The ability to play when we are done charging

ability_thrusters_activate_jump.description: The ability to play when we are done charging

ability_thrusters_activate_land.description: The ability to play when we are done charging

ability_thrusters_deactivate.description: The ability to play when we are done charging
